title: WorksDomain Fronting works at HTTPS
extract: Domain fronting. Domain fronting is a technique that circumvents Internet censorship by obfuscating the domain of a HTTPS connection. Working in the application layer, domain fronting allows a user to connect to a service that may be otherwise be blocked via by DNS, IP or deep packet inspection.
extract_html: Domain fronting. Domain fronting is a technique that circumvents Internet censorship by obfuscating the domain of a HTTPS connection. Working in the application layer, domain fronting allows a user to connect to a service that may be otherwise be blocked via by DNS, IP or deep packet inspection.
